Meet Cotton
Animal ID 52129288 
Species Dog 
Breed Alaskan Husky/Mix 
Age 3 years 6 days 
Gender Male 
Size Large 
Color White 
Spayed/Neutered  
Declawed No 
Site Seattle Animal Shelter 
Location Dog Kennels 
Hello, my name is Cotton! I enjoy walks and playing with my sister Nova. I'm a friendly dog that loves to hangout!

To meet this dog, please download and fill out an adoption survey (found here) - http://www.seattle.gov/Documents/Departments/AnimalShelter/Dog%20Adoption%20Questionnaire_Fillable.pdf and email it to our Animal Care Team at: animalcare@seattle.gov
-and/or visit the shelter during our open hours: Wednesday, Saturday and Sunday 1pm to 5pm, no appointment needed.
